    • Method Detail

      • canAttack

        public boolean canAttack(Unit unit)
        Description copied from class: Unit
        Tests if this unit can attack to another unit.
        Overrides:
        canAttack in class Unit
        Returns:
        true if the distance to the other unit is within the minimum and maximum range of attack. And also, this unit is alive; false if the distance to the other unit is outside the minimum and maximum range of attack. Or, if this unit is dead.

      • attackToUnit

        public void attackToUnit(Unit unit)
        Description copied from class: Unit
        This method attacks the passed unit by parameter. Before invoke method canAttack(Unit) to validate if can attack.
        Overrides:
        attackToUnit in class Unit
